author: bridge-bot
content:
<arikgal> Hi all,
I hope this fits in here:
Trying to make sense of all the permutations of Gas calculation schemes in the ecosystem.
my initial mapping is:
1. EVM compatible - post-london fork calculation
2. Old EVM compatible - pre-london fork calculation
3. Two-level fee - Splitting the fee for L2 costs (hopefully EVM compatible) and L1 (DA) costs
4. eip-4844 blob calculation (maybe part of #1?)

Then there are some other schemes I consider more "custom".
Do you agree or have a better framework for this?
